18#include "BitMatrix.h"
19
20#include <vector>
21#include <cstddef>
22
23namespace ZXing {
24namespace OneD {
25
26/**
27* <p>Encapsulates functionality and implementation that is common to one-dimensional barcodes.</p>
28*
29* @author dsbnatut@gmail.com (Kazuki Nishiura)
30*/
31class WriterHelper
32{
33 static int AppendPattern(std::vector<bool>& target, int pos, const int* pattern, size_t patternCount, bool startColor);
34public:
35 /**
36 * @return a byte array of horizontal pixels (0 = white, 1 = black)
37 */
38 static BitMatrix RenderResult(const std::vector<bool>& code, int width, int height, int sidesMargin);
39
40 /**
41 * @param target encode black/white pattern into this array
42 * @param pos position to start encoding at in {@code target}
43 * @param pattern lengths of black/white runs to encode
44 * @param startColor starting color - false for white, true for black
45 * @return the number of elements added to target.
46 */
47 template <typename Container>
48 static int AppendPattern(std::vector<bool>& target, int pos, const Container& pattern, bool startColor) {
49 return AppendPattern(target, pos, pattern.data(), pattern.size(), startColor);
50 }
51};
52
53} // OneD
54} // ZXing
55
